items.content_html: General scripts, snippets, and tools. Files are meant to be lightweight, and able to be used with minimal customizations (if any).

items.content_html: Task-Wise is a lightweight and intuitive to-do list application built with React.js, leveraging the power of the Context API for state management. With a clean and minimalist user interface, Task Wsie allows users to efficiently organize their tasks and stay on top of their daily goals.
items.title: sarthakvijayvargiya/Task-Wise: Task-Wise is a lightweight and intuitive to-do list application built with React.js, leveraging the power of the Context API for state management. With a clean and minimalist user interface, Task Wsie allows users to efficiently organize their tasks and stay on top of their daily goals.

items.content_html: GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) is a lightweight, powerful JavaScript library for timeline-based animations. With precise control, developers can create engaging animations. TweenMax enables complex animations with minimal JavaScript. Club GreenSock's DrawSVG plugin adds dynamic animations.
items.title: vishalgunjalSWE/GSAP-Workshop: GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) is a lightweight, powerful JavaScript library for timeline-based animations. With precise control, developers can create engaging animations. TweenMax enables complex animations with minimal JavaScript. Club GreenSock's DrawSVG plugin adds dynamic animations.

items.content_html: 🐶 Perrito offers a fast, straightforward setup for WebSocket servers, making real-time communication between clients and servers effortless. Designed for developers, it provides a lightweight platform for the rapid prototyping and development of applications that rely on WebSocket servers.
items.title: KAIKAKU-AI/perrito-ws: 🐶 Perrito offers a fast, straightforward setup for WebSocket servers, making real-time communication between clients and servers effortless. Designed for developers, it provides a lightweight platform for the rapid prototyping and development of applications that rely on WebSocket servers.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
